events.message: I received my order yesterday, but unfortunately I want to return it because the size doesn't fit and I need a refund.
The reported case has been classified as a Refund request based on the customer's message mentioning a return and refund.
Customer support representative has been assigned to handle the refund request and communicate with the customer.
Hello! Thank you for contacting us. I'm here to help you with your refund request and will guide you through the process.
Could you please provide the order number and confirm if the item has been unused and in original packaging for the return?
Sure, my order number is #123456789. The item is unused and still in its original packaging, I have not opened or worn it.
Thank you for the details. You can return the item using the prepaid shipping label we will email you shortly. Once received, a full refund will be processed.
That sounds great, thank you for your help. I'll wait for the shipping label to return the item as soon as possible.
The prepaid shipping label email has been sent. Please let us know if you have any further questions. We consider the refund request process initiated.
Just checking in to confirm that you have successfully sent the return package and received your refund. Please contact us if you need further assistance.
Since the refund has been processed and no further issues have been reported, we are closing this support case. Thank you for reaching out to us.
